Question: His 1975 recording of Stevie Wonder's hit, "Living for the City" later helped this person win another Grammy.
Hints: This person possessed one of the most recognizable voices in American music.
On November 14, 1961, this person was arrested on a narcotics charge in an Indiana hotel room, where he waited to perform.
On Halloween and Washington's birthday, the Colored Department of the school had socials where this person would play.
